questions.question: This panet is the coolest in our solar system.
This planet is three quarters covered by water.
This is the smallest planet in our solar system.
This planet is the hottest in our solar system.
This planet is the farthest from our sun in our solar system.
Gin derives its distinguishing flavor from this type of berry.
St James Gate Brewery, home to this beer, was originally leased to its creator for 45 Irish Pounds per year for 9,000 years.
Named after a New York borough, this drink is traditionally made with rye whiskey, bitters, and sweet vermouth.
A mixture of gin, vodka, rum, tequila, sweet and sour, and Coke, this drink does not actually contain the beverage listed in its name.
Containing roughly 49 million bubbles, the pressure in a bottle of this beverage is approximately 90 pounds per square inch.
Led by Christano Ronaldo, this Spanish football team won the UEFA Champions League tournament in 2017.
Boasting players such as Tim Duncan and Manu Ginobili, this NBA franchise has the highest all time winning percentage in the NBA.
Breaking the “Curse of the Billy Goat,” this national league baseball team won the World Series in 2016.
Widely considered the greatest hockey player of all time, Wayne Gretsky began his career in Edmonton, playing for this team.
This NFL team plans to relocate to Las Vegas, Nevada in 2019.
This metal is liquid at room temperature.
The 235 isotope of this element is used to generate energy for nuclear power plants.
This gas is used extensively in exterior lighting, and not just in Las Vegas.
Upon discovery of the Comstock Load in 1859, people flocked to Nevada to mine for this metal, abbreviated Ag.
Abbreviated K, this element can be found in bananas and helps reduce the occurrence of muscle cramps.
This quote was said by a famous inventor, “Stay hungry, stay foolish.”
This quote was said by a famous inventor, “Creativity is intelligence having fun.”
This quote was said by a famous inventor, “If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses.”
This quote was said by a famous inventor, “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”
This quote was said by a famous inventor, “The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.”
The first interracial kiss on American Network Television was aired on this sci-fi series in 1968.
Starring Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz, this tv show was voted the “Best TV Show of all Time” in a poll done by ABC News.
The longest running animated series in US history is this show, having aired over 500 episodes.
This talk show host headlined a late night show on CNN from 1985-2010, winning two Peabody Awards and 10 Cable ACE Awards.
This HBO show is an adaptation of George R.R. Martin’s novel series titled “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
This Amazonian woman can make you tell the truth with the lasso of truth
You better not make this green monster angry
This man of metal from Marvel is known for his high tech suit
This clown is known for asking “Why so serious?”
This dark knight is based in Gotham City
This company slogan is, “Betcha Can't Eat Just One”
This company slogan is, “The Ultimate Driving Machine”
This company slogan is, “Just do it”
This company slogan is, “There are some things money can't buy. For everything else, there's MasterCard.”
This company slogan is, “Think Different”
wrong_answers: Federal government of the United States

questions.question: This man made a famous speech titled “I have a dream”
This war was known as “The Great War”
wrong_answers: Atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki

wrong_answers: Gilbert du Motier, Marquis de Lafayette
